attributes.action: Strip away energy price rises people are struggling
attributes.additional_details: Revoke the increases and put a stop to it! Energy providers recorded 40billion pound profit last year before the increase. It’s just pure greed. The government are suppose to be our voice and our team. Start showing it.
attributes.background: The new energy rises need to be taken away! People were struggling Before the increase was introduced. We were choosing to eat or be warm before these energy increases and now you have taken the decision out there hands but making sure they can’t afford energy bills It’s 2022 listen to your nation

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a decision for energy providers.

You might like to sign this petition

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606586
